item.title: USB Recon Tool: 1st year project
item.description: -AEC- ALL Notes: Contents Recon Useful information Purpose of information Communication of Data HTTP FTP Server FTP Server Types Configuration Update Linux Install and Start VSFTPD Configuring VSFTPD Anon FTP Inotify and Linux services Commands (Status) Server-side permissions chroot Client (winSCP) Dealing with the Data Windows Structure File System Log Files Comparison to Linux Autorun Feature (EXT) Privelege escalation XP Service packs Why did we choose this?
